itunes:title: Quarantine Clouds with Silver Linings
title: Quarantine Clouds with Silver Linings
description: Shaye’s feeling frisky and Angela dances like a chicken for her children at bedtime? This one is all about our current joys, despite the quarantine. Pour a glass and share in what we can give thanks for, won't you?
content:encoded: Shaye’s feeling frisky and Angela dances like a chicken for her children at bedtime? This one is all about our current joys, despite the quarantine. Pour a glass and share in what we can give thanks for, won't you?
itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott
